content.question: Paint spills onto a floor in a circular pattern. The radius of the spill increases at a constant rate of <math alttext="2.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> inches per minute. How fast is the area of the spill increasing when the radius of the spill is <math alttext="18" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>18</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> inches?

choices.label: <math alttext="5 pi square inches per minute" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.45em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>in</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>min</mtext></mrow></math>

<math alttext="36 pi square inches per minute" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>36</mn><mi>π</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.45em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>in</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>min</mtext></mrow></math>

<math alttext="45 pi square inches per minute" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>45</mn><mi>π</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.45em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>in</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>min</mtext></mrow></math>

<math alttext="90 pi square inches per minute" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>90</mn><mi>π</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.45em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>in</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>min</mtext></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="90 pi square inches per minute" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>90</mn><mi>π</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.45em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>in</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>min</mtext></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
